item.title: interview with jasper morrison, A&W designer of the year 2016 at imm cologne
item.description:
interview with jasper morrison, A&W designer of the year 2016 at imm cologne

interview with jasper morrison, A&W designer of the year 2016 at imm cologne interview with jasper morrison, A&W designer of the year 2016 at imm cologne portrait Â© designboom the A&W designer of the year award has become recognized as an important title given by the editors of the A&W architektur & wohnen - germany's style-setting premium magazine for architecture, design, interior and gardening - to individuals who have played an important role in shaping the contemporary world of design.

item.title: Thisispaper
item.description:
Thisispaper

Ilona van den Bergh designs and manufactures contemporary ceramic utensils and decorative pieces.

item.title: Arnaud Lapierre's Triangle Tables are graphic objects. | MOCO LOCO
item.description:
Arnaud Lapierre's Triangle Tables are graphic objects. | MOCO LOCO

Details: Composed of geometric components, a circular table top and a triangular base made of squares, Arnaud Lapierre's Triangle Tables are striking graphic objects that straddle visual art and function.

item.title: 2016 heralds beginning of the "megatall" skyscraper era
item.description:
2016 heralds beginning of the "megatall" skyscraper era

The number of skyscrapers over 600 metres high - known as "megatalls" - is set to more than double in the next few years, say experts. Skyscraper authority the Council on Tall Buildings and Urban Habitat (CTBUH) has revealed that the number of 600-metre-plus buildings in the world is set to rise from three to seven in the next five years.

item.title: nendo combines diverse textures and distinct flavors for ultimate chocolate dessert experience
item.description:
nendo combines diverse textures and distinct flavors for ultimate chocolate dessert experience

nendo combines diverse textures and distinct flavors for ultimate chocolate dessert experience nendo combines diverse textures and distinct flavors for ultimate chocolate dessert experience photos by akihiro yoshida released in 2015, ' chocolatexture' was based on the theme of chocolates with the same raw materials but with diverse textures and different tastes created from those distinctive textures.

item.title: carina deuschl showcases collapsable xtend bathtub at imm cologne 2016
item.description:
carina deuschl showcases collapsable xtend bathtub at imm cologne 2016

carina deuschl showcases collapsable xtend bathtub at imm cologne 2016 carina deuschl showcases collapsable xtend bathtub at imm cologne 2016 image courtesy of carina deuschl prototyped by carina deuschl, 'xtend' redefines the ordinary concept of a bathtub. the project was featured at the 2016 imm cologne ' pure talents ' contest spotlighting up-and-coming designers from around the world.

item.title: wood and fabric mingle in minimal floating light by spitsberg
item.description:
wood and fabric mingle in minimal floating light by spitsberg

wood and fabric mingle in minimal floating light by spitsberg wood and fabric mingle in minimal floating light by spitsberg all images courtesy of spitsberg amsterdam-based studio spitsberg - led by dutch designers jeroen van leur and thijmen van der steen - has a knack for making subtle, beautifully crafted home decor and furniture elements.
